title: Kumo desu ga, Nani ka?: Kumoko Sisters no Nichijou
description: I was a normal highschool girl but then I was reincarnated as a monster spider in a parallel world. To survive in this labyrinth full of monsters, I used a skill " Parallel Will" and split my mind in 4 but now each will has their own body … ?
